about_the_game:
MOLY is a VR puzzle-solving immersive rowing simulator that uses VR rowing gameplay to represent the authors' perceptions of the world and their aspirations for the future as they come of age.

The five levels of this game represent the different stages of the road to knowledge. The game itself is both the riddle and the riddle. It is a search for the commonality of people of the same age, “MOLY” has our tracing back to the confusion, the questioning of the future, and the major propositions that we have experienced will be presented in the game. We wish you the courage to face the chaos, pack your bags, start again after each bumpy ride, and usher in a new perception of the world.
